title: Vibe Coding Startup Lovable Wants to Hit $1 Billion In Annualized Sales Next Year
description: Lovable, a Swedish artificial intelligence startup, made a big splash in July when it called itself the “fastest-growing startup” in the world. Its chief executive says that isn’t stopping.
content:

title: Business warns of ‘union veto’ of AI use
description: Four major business groups have strongly opposed a key government agency’s backing for workers to co-design the rollout of artificial intelligence.
content:
The country’s four major business groups have united to oppose a key government agency’s backing for workers to co-design the rollout of artificial intelligence, fearing it paves the way for a union veto over the technology.

title: Australian Lawyer Apologizes for AI-Generated Errors in Murder Case
description: MELBOURNE, Australia (AP) — A senior lawyer in Australia has apologized to a judge for filing submissions in a murder case that included fake quotes and non-existent case judgments generated by artificial intelligence.
